Question
========
  
In a sample of Dutch employees with a burn-out the stress level is measured by the number of nanograms cortisol per milliliter in saliva. What is the measurement level of this variable?
  
Answerlist
----------
* Dichotomous.
* Ordinal.
* Quantitative.
* Discrete.
